Lagrange's Multiplier 

find the optmial $\theta$ under the given constraints. 
If,
    $g(\theta) = \alpha$ 
is the constraint then,

add a penalty $P(\theta)$ to the loss function such that,
    $P(\theta) = g^-(\theta)$
